name: R5-ChargeItemStatus-R4-ChargeItemStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ChargeItemStatus into FHIR R4

element.display: The processing of the charge was aborted.

target.display: The processing of the charge was aborted.

element.display: The charge item is ready for billing.

target.display: The charge item is ready for billing.

element.display: The charge item has been billed (e.g. a billing engine has generated financial transactions by applying the associated ruled for the charge item to the context of the Encounter, and placed them into Claims/Invoices.

target.display: The charge item has been billed (e.g. a billing engine has generated financial transactions by applying the associated ruled for the charge item to the context of the Encounter, and placed them into Claims/Invoices.

element.display: The charge item has been entered in error and should not be processed for billing.

target.display: The charge item has been entered in error and should not be processed for billing.

element.display: The charge item has been determined to be not billable (e.g. due to rules associated with the billing code).

target.display: The charge item has been determined to be not billable (e.g. due to rules associated with the billing code).

element.display: The charge item has been entered, but the charged service is not  yet complete, so it shall not be billed yet but might be used in the context of pre-authorization.

target.display: The charge item has been entered, but the charged service is not  yet complete, so it shall not be billed yet but might be used in the context of pre-authorization.

element.display: The authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this charge item  Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just not known which one.

target.display: The authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this charge item  Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just not known which one.
